Auditor Form Integration Example

How to Use This CDN Form

After building the project, you'll get a auditor-form.umd.js file in the dist folder. Host this file on your CDN and use it like this:

1. Include the Script

<script src="https://your-cdn.com/auditor-form.umd.js"></script>

2. Create Container

<div id="auditor-form-container"></div>

3. Initialize with Your Headers

window.initAuditorForm('auditor-form-container', { apiUrl: 'https://your-api.com/api', apiHeaders: { 'x-access-api-key': 'your-access-key', 'x-public-api-key': 'your-public-key', 'Authorization': 'Bearer your-token', // Add any custom headers you need }, recaptchaSiteKey: 'your-recaptcha-key', theme: { primaryColor: '#059669', backgroundColor: '#f0fdf7' } });
